attributes.action: Test All Health Care Workers with suspected Covid-19 virus immediately.
attributes.additional_details: To get the frontline workers back to work ASAP to help fight the disease, and protect them from the outbreak.
attributes.background:
Test all suspected Health Care workers.
Provide disposable protective gear for them.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304005.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
